abstract: A descriptor representing the compute pipeline’s function.
overview:
## Discussion

You don’t assign instances of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4FunctionDescriptor] to this property directly, instead assign an instance of one of its subclasses, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4LibraryFunctionDescriptor], which represents a function from a Metal library.

# computeFunctionDescriptor

**Instance Property**

A descriptor representing the compute pipeline’s function.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var computeFunctionDescriptor: MTL4FunctionDescriptor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You don’t assign instances of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4FunctionDescriptor] to this property directly, instead assign an instance of one of its subclasses, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4LibraryFunctionDescriptor], which represents a function from a Metal library.
title: computeFunctionDescriptor
